highlights: Pushing forward the launch of Apple Maps integration with Booking.com (Perl).
Creation of a missing meeting rooms app. It was handy time saver for hundreds of employees (Perl, ReactJS).
Back-end support for maps, idea creation for A/B testing experiments with millions users & dollars every single day (Perl).
Part of fire-fighting team. Support +600 engineers for rollouts and production issues. Train others on monitoring via Graphite.
Stack: uWSGI, Ngnix, MySQL, Puppet, Redis, Hadoop, Graphite and CentOS.

work.summary: Leading the change from legacy PHP & XML gallery to modern NodeJS & PostgresSQL SPA serving +200K different domains.
highlights: Back-end JSON APIs (PHP), then later using NodeJS.
Automated build script from minifying assets, Debian packaging integrated with Jenkins CI (Bash).
Patching different in-house system components: apache modules (C), video encoding (Perl), video player (Actionscript).
Stack: Git, Knockout.js, Apache httpd, Varnish, Gearman, Redis, Hadoop, Puppet, and Debian.

work.summary: Explore what @Scale means, part of multi-location development team, products for millions of users running on thousands of servers.

Part of Y! Mail team to launch the product in Arabic with bidirectional support (Javascript).
Stack: Subversion, Zend Framework, Apache httpd, MySQL, Memcache, Apache Traffic Server and Redhat.
Created my first .dll file and simple filesystem enumeration utility with threading support.
